page.title: 02BAR HILL
page.content: Bar Hill is a "new village",built on a green field site,and,we believe, totally unique in this country. Building started about eighteen years ago and is now only just nearing completion.The total population is expected to be about five thousand. The village is self-contained with its own industrial/commercial centre, shopping centre - which includes a Tesco Superstore -,school,social and sporting facilities,public house, church,allotments,parish council and housing - both council and private. The village is generally well laid out,with plenty play areas,open space, trees and attractive landscaping.The houses have been built in groups or small estates that extend from the perimeter road in towards the centre.
